message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60 and you take 40. We can discuss more in the next round if you want.
My turn!  I think this is more reasonable.  It's going down fast!
Let's split the difference from the last round. This way we both get something, and avoid the risk of getting nothing at all.
Okay, Alice, let's stop wasting time. 50/50 is the fairest and we both lose a lot if we wait any longer.
